text:
"Satyameva Jayati" was a Bengali television Soap Opera that premiered on April 30, 2018 and aired on Colors Bangla. Produced By Eye Wash Productions, The Show Stars Raja Goswami and Rupsha Chakraborty in lead roles and Subhadra Roy in a supporting role.The Show telecasted Monday To Sunday at 6:00 P.M. This Show is Inspired from a Marathi Serial.
Plot.
The Show revolve around the lives of the mother-in-law and the daughter-in-law and how interestingly their roles get reversed at work place when Satyapriya, who is a constable, reports to sub-inspector, Jayati.  While dealing with crime in their unique and hysterical methods, the duo occasionally also rope in their family members to assist in the job.
